Package index

Data

{lovecraftr} contains the following datasets.

at_the_mountains_of_madness
Dataset of "AT THE MOUNTAINS OF MADNESS"
azathoth
Dataset of "AZATHOTH"
beyond_the_wall_of_sleep
Dataset of "BEYOND THE WALL OF SLEEP"
celephais
Dataset of "CELEPHAIS"
cool_air
Dataset of "COOL AIR"
dagon
Dataset of "DAGON"
dreams_in_the_witch_house
Dataset of "DREAMS IN THE WITCH-HOUSE"
ex_oblivione
Dataset of "EX OBLIVIONE"
facts_concerning_the_late_arthur_jermyn_and_his_family
Dataset of "FACTS CONCERNING THE LATE ARTHUR JERMYN AND HIS FAMILY"
from_beyond
Dataset of "FROM BEYOND"
he
Dataset of "HE"
herbert_west_reanimator
Dataset of "HERBERT WEST: REANIMATOR"
hypnos
Dataset of "HYPNOS"
imprisoned_with_the_pharoahs
Dataset of "IMPRISONED WITH THE PHARAOHS"
in_the_vault
Dataset of "IN THE VAULT"
lovecraft
Dataset of Lovecraft's corpus
medusas_coil
Dataset of "MEDUSA'S COIL"
memory
Dataset of "MEMORY"
nyarlathotep
Dataset of "NYARLATHOTEP"
pickmans_model
Dataset of "PICKMAN'S MODEL"

Dataset of "POETRY OF THE GODS"

Dataset of "POLARIS"

Dataset of "THE ALCHEMIST"

Dataset of "THE BEAST IN THE CAVE"

Dataset of "THE BOOK"

Lovecraft's Corpus
